in small quantities with credit given to me as the designer 2 llama lou crochet yarn amigurumi are wonderful for using up small bits of yarn i made my samples using various colors found in my stash-- feel free to change up the yarn and color choices to make it your own just be sure that all the yarns you use are approximately the same thickness even two fingering weight yarns can vary slightly the yardages given are only estimates yours may vary depending on your gauge if you decided to make your astronaut in thicker yarn you will need even more than my estimates sample colors color 1 yarn and colors must-have in silver 20 yards color 2 yarn and colors must-have in graphite 5 yards color 3 yarn and colors must-have in sorbus 15 yards ©alyssa voznak 2024 pattern may not be resold or redistributed without permission items made from this pattern may be sold in small quantities with credit given to me as the designer 3 llama lou crochet notes all stitches are worked through both loops unless otherwise specified all rounds are worked in a continuous spiral unless otherwise specified place a locking stitch marker in the first stitch of the round to keep track of your progress did you know that single_crochet comes in two different shapes the more common version which is v-shaped is made by wrapping the yarn over the hook but in this pattern i use the x-shaped variety which is made by wrapping the yarn under the hook this gives the stitches a nice square shape that stack on top of each other nicely either one works just fine in this pattern feel free to use whichever version you prefer just note that the finished toy might look slightly different than my sample if you use v-shaped stitches abbreviations this pattern is written in us crochet terminology slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet increase = increase by making 2 sts in the same stitch decrease = decrease by crocheting 2 sts together flo = crochet through the front loop only blo = crochet thought the back loop only i d love to see what you ve made find me at email llamaloucrochet@hotmail com ravelry www ravelry
